product_name: Merrell Ngeo Crew T-Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Wearable, practical and comfortable, the Merrell Ngeo Crew T-Shirt is an ultimate tech tee that moves moisture and dries fast. Merrell Opti-Wick(TM) polyester/elastane fabric blend moves moisture away from your skin and dries quickly to keep you comfortable. Fabric performs like a synthetic but feels like cotton for excellent comfort. With a UPF 20 rating, fabric provides very good protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Closeout.
short_description: Wearable, practical and comfortable, the Merrell Ngeo Crew T-Shirt is an ultimate tech tee that moves moisture and dries fast.
